body:
On Dec 11, 2004, at 1:04 AM, Greg Ward wrote:


> The d in d^w has to be meters, not feet.  That could account for the 
> 10x difference.


Gah, that would be an hour-long brain fart.  Of course that would 
account for the 10(.76)x difference.  Thank you, Greg.  How 
embarrassing.  What's that smell?
___
